data.title: Yle's president cards: How does Nils Torvalds find his inner peace?
data.meta_description: Yle's presidential election playing card game allows you to easily compare details about all of the candidates running for presidentâ€”and include some surprising information.
data.text:
Parts of the article content might not be accessible, for example, with a screen reader.

Yle's presidential election playing cards are a collection of details, facts and biographical information about the eight politicians running for election as president of Finland.

The cards include details that wouldn't ordinarily come up in the election compass or election debates, including pets, earlier careers outside politics and a look at families and hobbies.

How else would you discover, for example, that Nils Torvalds likes to relax at his island hideaway in the Turku archipelago?

The presidential election playing cards can be viewed here.
